description.value:
Your spellcasting can unleash surges of untamed magic. After you cast a level 1+ Sorcerer spell, roll a d12. If you roll a 7 or higher, roll on the @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.rollable-tables.RollTable.QaqX68tEj2Mevbfo]{Wild Magic Surge} table to create a magical effect. If that effect is a spell, it is too wild to be affected by your Metamagic, and if it normally requires Concentration, it does not require Concentration in this case; the spell lasts for its full duration.

Once you release the surge, the chance of releasing another surge is reduced. Now you consult the Wild Magic Surge table on a roll or 8 or higher. If you produce another surge, afterwards, consult the Wild Magic table if you roll a 9 or higher. This continues further with 10 or higher, then 11 or higher and finally at 12. Eventually the you will consult the Wild Magic table only if you roll a 12.

Once you complete a Long Rest, the chance of producing a Wild Magic Surge is reset to 7 or higher.

Once you are a level 5 Sorcerer, when you regain Sorcery Points with your Flows of Sorcery you can reduce the number needed to trigger a Wild Magic Surge on a d12 by 1 for each Sorcery Point recovered, down to a minimum of 7.

activation.condition: you cast a sorcerer spell of 1st level or higher
